title: Visual and Textual Cue Utilization Strategies to Enhance Educational Video Learning Effectiveness (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of core science curriculum concepts and experience with video-based learning
context.additional_context: Conducting science experiment video production and analysis projects using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can accurately reproduce scientific concepts by 20% or more using visual and textual cues within videos.
Learners achieve 80% or higher in organizing and integrating core information in formative assessments after video-based learning.
Learners focus their gaze on cue areas for 60% or more of the time while watching videos.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
